about.title: About me
about.primary: I am Kevin, I have studied at Ryerson University and have my Bachelor's Degree in Science as a Computer Science major. I am currently looking to become a software developer and continue  to hone my skills as a developer. I have established a solid foundation in Java, showcasing my expertise in object-oriented programming principles. In addition to my proficiency in Java, I have acquired valuable skills in web development, with experience in frameworks such as Spring Boot, Angular and React. My passion for technology drives me to continually explore new horizons, and my current journey involves immersing myself in the dynamic Salesforce platform.
about.secondary: My main hobby is cooking, I love to experiment with different recipes and cooking methods and customizing them to perfection.

projects.title: Pairnotes Website
projects.description: Agile team project: Collaborative platform built with Angular CLI & Google Firebase, featuring real-time note editing. Seamlessly share and edit notes for a dynamic user experience.

projects.title: Bob'sBlogify
projects.description: Blog'sBlogify: Seamlessly share your thoughts on this minimalist blogpost platform. Crafted with Spring Boot, Thymeleaf, and powered by Java for a robust blogging experience.

projects.title: Submarine Simulation Environment
projects.description: Explore the ocean's depths with our Submarine Simulation project. In collaboration, we developed a captivating 3D environment using C++ and freeglut, allowing users to take the helm of a submarine. Engage in epic battles, navigate, and interact with a dynamic underwater world filled with objects and AI-controlled submarines.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: This is where you can describe about your contact. The more you describe about your contact, the more chances you have!
